Changeset.Change: Ability to access authorized SPARQL endpoints
Support for updating the list of entities and categories at runtime
Ability to access authorized SPARQL endpoints
Analyzing search results starting from a specific offset
Synchronize the execution of parallel steps while analyzing search results
Added new dependencies that require FORTH maven repository
Modification in the initialization process of xsearch-service
Supporting exchange of messages using TCP connections
Retrieving the required configuration files during deployment time
